column4: Basically i need the "Nullified" account to look for "Gnome" instead of "Enlightenment"
Can you not just select gnome session with gdm
I select the account "Nullified" click login and it spews a message at me saying that I've been connected less than 10 seconds, and then takes me back to the accounts page
Change the session type (I don't use gdm so I can't tell you exactly how to do it)
